title: PBE Download incredibly slow?
body: I've been wondering whether or not this is a common issue, But after having been accepted into the PBE yesterday, I began to download all the necessary files, but my download speed has been capped at around 430 kbps, which is approximately a 5th of my actual download speed, which makes me wonder if there is anything to remedy this cap on my download speed.

replies.body: I had the same problem and i thought about leaving the client update before i login and now it is 50 % after 30 mins
same If you find smth tell me
Same here :( got in yesterday but it's downloading at 70kb/s. Been open for a few hours and it's only at 22%. I guess I just have to wait until I have a wired connection again.
the same i have 2mb download speed and now on pbe it is 132kbps , i am getting boring {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

Have this problem as well. It appears that as soon as I start downloading I get my usual download speed, but as the download progresses, my download speed rapidly reduces to around 200kbs. Seriously doubt it is something to do with connection issues, as my league client downloads fine.
yup, slow for me also. I usually have a 60 mbps download speed, but here im getting 350kbps at most. Im pretty frustrated by this and ready to give up.

I just got accepted to download the PBE, and i have but 10% after 45 minutes. I have around 90/mb download speed, so it was rather disappointing to read that the download speed was a mere 690kb/s at best. I rechecked my overall download speed using my phone, and i had 20mb/s download speed with everyone in the house (4) using their devices through WiFi connection. I'm not sure why this is happening but its really inconvenient.
it doesn't even shows me how fast it downloads

I got accepted yesterday and after waiting 7 hours, it was only at 24%. It then had to restart due to maintenance 2 times, and one time due to "internet connection problems". I got it going again and left my computer in sleep mode so it can download and be done by today. I wake up to another "trying to connect to the internet" and after 5 minutes, "exit the client and try again". This is honestly ridiculous and sad. I thought PBE was supposed to be a fun experience. I'm happy to be a tester but so far I haven't been able to even play on it. {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

I got stuck with 20-40 kb/s which gives me an eta ~ 48 hours; also 3 times during the download I had to restart due to errors and Riot maintenance . Definitely not going to be enjoying the PBE any time soon lol.

As long as you're not running into any errors, it's best to just let the patcher do it's thing.  Speeds can very depending on the strength of your connection and even quality of your hard drive.  Once you're all done, you can go over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune things up.  I hope that helps!
